embeds.title: Ice Bear
embeds.description:
Hello, My name is Devin, and I’m a 17 year old nerd who likes to *attempt* to code and graphic design.

I joined this Discord server around the first quarter of last year, mainly to find other like-minded people, and see what ChromeOS has to offer while listening to others and having fun chatting. I don’t really play games that much anymore, but when I do, it’s just Minecraft.

I like to mess around with breaking software and setting arduino LEDs on fire in my free time, and try to have a social life in school and online. I do not like getting pinged or being made fun of for who I am though, so please try to avoid that :)

The Chromebook I currently own is a Samsung Chromebook Plus v2 m3 model
